Mark Onoja, PMD Pro is a
Transformational Leader, Monitoring, Evaluation, Accountability, and Learning Specialist, Data Analyst and Researcher

As a dedicated professional with over 14 years of experience in development and public health, I have established myself as a seasoned professional in data management, monitoring, evaluation, and program implementation. My expertise spans training and capacity building, project management, interpersonal communication, and database management.

I have a strong passion for influencing positive behavior change and maintenance using evidence-based approaches. My leadership skills have been demonstrated through my ability to build and sustain strategic relationships with key stakeholders, ensuring effective coordination and information flow.
